name: Stitch It Up!
description:
STITCH IT UP! is a game about repairing a cute (but leaking) water balloon. Prolong your balloon's life by stitching up holes with your trusty needle and thread! Outlast your friend and compete for the title of last balloon standing.

This game was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2020.

Programming

  • Justin Juay
  • Chue Sai Hou

Art, FX and Animations

  • Tay Yi Chong

SFX and BGM from Unity Asset Store
